mapper.select:
SELECT a.na_bzplc -- 경제통합사업장코드 , a.fhs_id_no || '-' || a.farm_amnno as fhs_id_no -- 농가식별번호 , a.fhs_id_no as sra_fhs_id_no -- 농가식별번호 , a.farm_amnno -- 농장관리번호 , a.farm_id_no -- 농장식별번호 , a.na_trpl_c -- 경제통합거래처코드 , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN a.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(a.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(a.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(a.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(a.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(a.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(a.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(a.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(a.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(a.FTSNM) = 5 THEN SUBSTR(a.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(a.FTSNM,5,1) WHEN LENGTH(a.FTSNM) > 5 THEN SUBSTR(a.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(a.FTSNM,5,1) END AS FTSNM /* 농가명 */ , a.zip -- 우편번호 , a.dongup -- 동이상주소 , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN a.DONGBW ELSE RPAD(' ', length(a.dongbw), '*') END as dongbw -- 동이하주소 , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN trim(a.OHSE_TELNO) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 11 or LENGTH(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 12 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),8,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) < 9 THEN '***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(trim(a.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),4,4) END AS OHSE_TELNO /* 농가 집전화번호 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN a.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '****' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '***' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) IN (11,12) THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO /* 출하주 핸드폰번호 */ , a.maco_yn -- 조합원여부 , a.rmk_cntn -- 비고내용 , a.jrdwo_dsc -- 관내외구분 , a.del_yn -- 삭제여부 , a.hdwk_rg_yn -- 수작업여부 , a.anw_yn -- 한우종합여부 , a.SRA_FED_SPY_YN -- 사료사용여부 , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN NVL(A.SRA_FARM_ACNO,A.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) ELSE CASE WHEN LENGTH(NVL(A.SRA_FARM_ACNO,A.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO)) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(NVL(A.SRA_FARM_ACNO,A.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO),1,LENGTH(NVL(A.SRA_FARM_ACNO,A.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO)) -4) || '****' ELSE NULL END END AS SRA_FARM_ACNO , case when (a.sra_farm_acno = '' or a.sra_farm_acno is null) then a.new_sra_farm_acno else a.sra_farm_acno end as io_sra_farm_acno , a.birth , RTRIM(a.FTSNM) as ORG_FTSNM , RTRIM(a.OHSE_TELNO) as ORG_OHSE_TELNO , RTRIM(a.CUS_MPNO) as ORG_CUS_MPNO , a.DONGBW as ORG_DONGBW , a.DEL_YN as DEL_YN , a.MB_INTG_NO , a.SMS_NO , case when SUBSTR(fhs_id_no, 1, 1) = 'G' then '1' else '0' end as etc_auc_obj_dsc_yn -- 기타가축여부 FROM tb_la_is_mm_fhs a left outer join tb_la_is_mm_mbintg b on ( a.mb_intg_no = b.mb_intg_no and b.mb_intg_gb = '02') WHERE a.ftsnm like #{sh_ftsnm} || '%' AND a.na_bzplc = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND ( a.DEL_YN = #{del_yn} OR #{del_yn} IS NULL ) AND nvl(b.delacc_yn, '0') = '0' AND nvl(b.dormacc_yn, '0') = '0'
AND SUBSTR(a.fhs_id_no,1,1) IN ('T','N','S')
ORDER BY a.lschg_dtm DESC

select TO_CHAR(a.na_bzplc) as na_bzplc , TO_CHAR(a.fhs_id_no) as fhs_id_no , TO_CHAR(a.farm_amnno) as farm_amnno , TO_CHAR(a.farm_id_no) as farm_id_no , TO_CHAR(NVL(a.na_trpl_c,'')) as na_trpl_c , TO_CHAR(a.ftsnm) as sra_fhsnm , TO_CHAR(NVL(substr(a.zip, 1,3),'')) as sra_fhs_fzip , TO_CHAR(NVL(substr(a.zip, 4,6),'')) as sra_fhs_rzip , TO_CHAR(a.dongup) as sra_fhs_dongup , TO_CHAR(a.dongbw) as sra_fhs_dongbw , TO_CHAR(case when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 9 then substr(TRIM(a.ohse_telno), 1,2) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 10 and substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'),1,2) = '02' then substr(a.ohse_telno, 1,2) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 10 and substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'),1,2) <> '02' then substr(a.ohse_telno, 1,3) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 11 then substr(a.ohse_telno, 1,3) end) as sra_fhs_atel , TO_CHAR(case when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 9 then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'), 3,3) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 10 and substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'),1,2) = '02' then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'), 3,4) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 10 and substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'),1,2) <> '02' then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'), 4,3) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 11 then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'), 4,4) end) as sra_fhs_htel , TO_CHAR(case when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 9 then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'), 6,4) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 10 and substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'),1,2) = '02' then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'), 7,4) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 10 and substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'),1,2) <> '02' then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'), 7,4) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]')) = 11 then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ohse_telno, '[^0-9]'), 8,4) end) as sra_fhs_stel , TO_CHAR(NVL(substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.cus_mpno, '[^0-9]'),1,3),'')) as sra_fhs_rep_mpsvno , TO_CHAR(case when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.cus_mpno, '[^0-9]')) = 10 then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.cus_mpno, '[^0-9]'), 4,3) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.cus_mpno, '[^0-9]')) = 11 then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.cus_mpno, '[^0-9]'), 4,4) end) as sra_fhs_rep_mphno , TO_CHAR(case when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.cus_mpno, '[^0-9]')) = 10 then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.cus_mpno, '[^0-9]'), 7,4) when length(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.cus_mpno, '[^0-9]')) = 11 then substr(REGEXP_REPLACE(a.cus_mpno, '[^0-9]'), 8,4) end) as sra_fhs_rep_mpsqno , TO_CHAR(a.rmk_cntn) as rmk_cntn , TO_CHAR(a.fsrg_dtm,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as fsrg_dtm , TO_CHAR(a.fsrgmn_eno) as fsrgmn_eno , TO_CHAR(a.lschg_dtm,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as lschg_dtm , TO_CHAR(a.ls_cmeno) as ls_cmeno , TO_CHAR(a.maco_yn) as maco_yn , TO_CHAR(b.brc) as brc , TO_CHAR(a.sra_farm_acno) as sra_farm_acno , a.MB_INTG_NO from tb_la_is_mm_fhs a , tb_la_is_mm_wmc b where a.na_bzplc = #{ss_na_bzplc} and a.na_bzplc = b.na_bzplc and a.anw_yn = '9' and trim(a.fhs_id_no) = trim(#{fhs_id_no}) and trim(a.farm_amnno) = trim(#{farm_amnno}) and trim(a.ftsnm) = trim(#{ftsnm}) and substr(a.fhs_id_no,1,1) in ('T', 'N', 'S')
select count(*) from TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW where trim(fhs_id_no) = trim(#{sra_fhs_id_no})
mapper.delete: delete from tb_la_is_mm_fhs where na_bzplc = #{ss_na_bzplc} /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ and trim(fhs_id_no) = trim(#{sra_fhs_id_no}) /* 농가코드 */ and trim(farm_amnno) = trim(#{farm_amnno}) /* 농장관리번호 */
mapper.select: SELECT na_bzplc -- 경제통합사업장코드 , fhs_id_no || '-' || farm_amnno as fhs_id_no -- 농가식별번호 , fhs_id_no as sra_fhs_id_no -- 농가식별번호 , farm_amnno -- 농장관리번호 , farm_id_no -- 농장식별번호 , na_trpl_c -- 경제통합거래처코드 , FTSNM /* 농가명 */ , zip -- 우편번호 , dongup -- 동이상주소 , dongbw -- 동이하주소 , OHSE_TELNO /* 농가 집전화번호 */ , CUS_MPNO /* 출하주 핸드폰번호 */ , maco_yn -- 조합원여부 , rmk_cntn -- 비고내용 , jrdwo_dsc -- 관내외구분 , del_yn -- 삭제여부 , hdwk_rg_yn -- 수작업여부 , anw_yn -- 한우종합여부 , SRA_FED_SPY_YN -- 사료사용여부 , case when (sra_farm_acno = '' or sra_farm_acno is null) then new_sra_farm_acno else sra_farm_acno end as sra_farm_acno , case when (sra_farm_acno = '' or sra_farm_acno is null) then new_sra_farm_acno else sra_farm_acno end as io_sra_farm_acno , birth , RTRIM(FTSNM) as ORG_FTSNM , RTRIM(OHSE_TELNO) as ORG_OHSE_TELNO , RTRIM(CUS_MPNO) as ORG_CUS_MPNO , DONGBW as ORG_DONGBW , DEL_YN as DEL_YN , MB_INTG_NO , SMS_NO , case when SUBSTR(fhs_id_no, 1, 1) = 'G' then '1' else '0' end as etc_auc_obj_dsc_yn FROM tb_la_is_mm_fhs WHERE fhs_id_no = #{sra_fhs_id_no} AND farm_amnno = #{farm_amnno} AND na_bzplc = #{ss_na_bzplc}

SELECT NA_BZPLC , FHS_ID_NO , FARM_AMNNO , FARM_ID_NO , NA_TRPL_C , FTSNM , ZIP , DONGUP , DONGBW , OHSE_TELNO , CUS_MPNO , MACO_YN , RMK_CNTN , JRDWO_DSC , DEL_YN , ANW_YN , HDWK_RG_YN , SRA_FARM_ACNO , NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO , SRA_FED_SPY_YN , BIRTH , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , MB_INTG_NO , SMS_NO , SMS_YMD FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND REPLACE(TRIM(FTSNM),' ','') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{ftsnm}),' ','') AND REPLACE(TRIM(BIRTH),' ','') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{birth}),' ','') AND REGEXP_REPLACE(CUS_MPNO, '[^0-9]') = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{cus_mpno}, '[^0-9]') AND DEL_YN = '0' AND ANW_YN = '9'
